title: Using social media to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics ...
summary: This article explores the use of social media data to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics in nature recreation, comparing it with traditional survey data and discussing the limitations and biases of survey data.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the article explicitly discusses "spatial and temporal dynamics" and compares social media data with "survey data", directly addressing "Spatio Temporal" and "Survey data".
